Reference

All functions

ITRF ITRF

Integrated Teacher Report Form

apply_dic()

Apply dictionary

check_values()

Check values Checks if values in variables are within the set difined in the values and type dictionary attributes.

dic_ITRF

Dictionary file for the Integrated Teacher Report Form.

dic_attr() `dic_attr<-`()

Set and get dictionary attributes

extract_dic()

Extract a dictionary from data file

get_index()

Get index

impute_missing()

Impute missing values

list_scales()

List scales

names2item() names2label()

Rename items Set names of items as long labels and vice versa.

replace_missing()

Replace Missing values

scaledic-package

Scale Dictionary

score_scale()

Score scale Calculates the scale scores.

select_scale()

Select a scale Selects a data frame with variables of a specific scale

select_scores()

Select scale scores Selects a data frame with score variables generated by score_scale.

set_dic()

Set dictionary informations to variable
